nodes.text: Frod Makora was a male Advozse who lived on the planet Rishi during the Galactic War. Shortly before the Battle of Rishi, the Wookiee Jakarro hired Makora to lend his speeder to Jakarro's allies in order to reach Tracyn Island. Unfortunately for Makora, the group was shot down on the approach and his vehicle was wrecked.

Frod Makora appear as the starter character for "Blood Hunt," a Flashpoint added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in the 2014 Digital Expansion Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan.
